articles.title: Third Alaskan health care worker has allergic reaction to Covid-19 vaccine
articles.description: An Alaska health care worker had an allergic reaction after receiving a dose of the new Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine, the third such incident in three days. The worker was treated and released after six hours.

articles.description: Gregory Bush was sentenced this week to life in prison without the possibility of parole for the racially motivated killings of two people at a suburban grocery store in Kentucky, according to Jefferson County court documents.
